title: Indian Banks Set To Enter Profit Boom: JPMorgan Sees Margins Stabilising, Higher Earnings
description: Indian banks are poised for what analysts at multinational brokerage JPMorgan calls a “tsunami of profit" after margins bottomed out in the second quarter, setting the stage for a sharp acceleration in earnings over the next three years.
content: Indian banks are poised for what analysts at multinational brokerage JPMorgan calls a tsunami of profit" after margins bottomed out in the second quarter, setting the stage for a sharp acceleration i… [+1190 chars]
de: Indische Banken stehen vor Gewinnboom: JPMorgan rechnet mit stabilisierten Margen und höheren Erträgen. Indische Banken stehen vor dem, was die Analysten des multinationalen Brokerhauses JPMorgan als „Gewinn-Tsunami“ bezeichnen, nachdem die Margen im zweiten Quartal ihren Tiefpunkt erreichten und damit die Voraussetzungen für eine deutliche Gewinnsteigerung in den nächsten drei Jahren schaffen.
en: Indian Banks Set To Enter Profit Boom: JPMorgan Sees Margins Stabilising, Higher Earnings. Indian banks are poised for what analysts at multinational brokerage JPMorgan calls a “tsunami of profit" after margins bottomed out in the second quarter, setting the stage for a sharp acceleration in earnings over the next three years.
la: Ripae Indian pone Ut ingrederetur utilitas BUTIO: JPMorgan videt Marginibus Stabilising, Superior CAPTURA. title: First Detailed Look at a Tsunami From Space Reveals Unexpected Feature
description: A satellite has tracked a tsunami in greater detail than ever before, which could help improve models of these giant waves and allow for better prediction and warning systems.
content:
A satellite has tracked a tsunami in greater detail than ever before, which could help improve models of these giant waves and allow for better prediction and warning systems.
Launched in 2022 by NA… [+2281 chars]

title: Satellite captures the first detailed look at a giant tsunami
description: A rare SWOT pass mapped a Pacific tsunami in detail, exposing hidden wave complexity and showing why forecasting models need a major update.
content:
When a magnitude 8.8 earthquake ripped through the Kuril-Kamchatka subduction zone on July 29, 2025, it launched a Pacific-wide tsunami – and a rare natural experiment.
NASA and the French space age… [+5730 chars]
de: Satellit fängt den ersten detaillierten Blick auf einen riesigen Tsunami ein. Ein seltener SWOT-Durchgang kartierte einen Tsunami im Pazifik im Detail, deckte die verborgene Wellenkomplexität auf und zeigte, warum Prognosemodelle einer umfassenden Aktualisierung bedürfen.
en: Satellite captures the first detailed look at a giant tsunami. A rare SWOT pass mapped a Pacific tsunami in detail, exposing hidden wave complexity and showing why forecasting models need a major update.

title: Layoff tsunami hits US as 71,000 jobs slashed in November: 2025 becomes first 1.1 million+ cut year since Pandemic
